message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your starting point is reasonable, but how about we split the difference on that 20% gap for a 55/45 split?
I see you're willing to compromise, but I think I can do a bit better than 55-45.
Time is money Alice, and that money is losing value fast. 52/48 is my final offer.
You said 52/48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a smaller step back, and we can still both walk away with something decent.
This is ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it - we both lose if this goes on.
